Projects

Research Paper Search Engine

Developed a research paper search engine using Python that scrapes data from PaperWithCode and Google Scholar. The application allows users to search for academic papers, retrieving the top 10 papers ranked by citation count, facilitating efficient access to high-quality research resources.

Key Features:

  • Web Scraping: Implemented web scraping techniques using BeautifulSoup and Requests libraries to gather data from PaperWithCode and Google Scholar, ensuring comprehensive and up-to-date research information.
  • Search Functionality: Enabled users to input search queries, retrieving relevant research papers along with their citation counts, providing a user-friendly search experience.
  • Ranking Algorithm: Developed a ranking algorithm that prioritizes papers based on citation counts, allowing users to access the most influential research quickly.
  • Data Presentation: Designed a clean and intuitive interface to display search results, including paper titles, authors, publication years, and citation counts, enhancing user engagement.

Food Factory App

Developed a research paper search engine using Python that scrapes data from PaperWithCode and Google Scholar. The application allows users to search for academic papers, retrieving the top 10 papers ranked by citation count, facilitating efficient access to high-quality research resources.

Key Features:

  • Developed a web app using Node.js, Express, and Sequelize ORM with a MySQL database (XAMPP), handling food orders for 10+ users
  • Enabled user sign-up/login functionality, allowing users to place orders and view their order history.
  • Implemented an inventory management system to monitor ingredients that fall below a defined threshold and track ingredients supplied by the same vendor.
  • Added a feature to identify and flag food items with a cost price (CP) higher than the selling price (SP).
  • Integrated administrative functionalities to deactivate users, optimizing user management and ensuring app compliance.
  • This project aimed to strengthen my knowledge of node.js and express.js learned during my internship at Andh Rathi.

Multimedia File Management System

Developed a comprehensive multimedia file management system that allows users to upload, access, convert, and merge various file types, including images, audio, and video. This web application enables users to manage their media files efficiently while providing functionalities such as token-based storage management, file conversion, and media merging.

Key Features:

  • Token Generation: Implemented a secure token generation system to identify user uploads, enhancing file management and retrieval.
  • File Uploading: Enabled users to upload files (images, audio, video) with support for various formats (JPEG, PNG, MP4, MP3) using a user-friendly interface, resulting in an increase in user engagement by 30%.
  • Text-to-Speech Conversion: Developed a text-to-speech feature that converts uploaded text files into audio files, improving accessibility for users.
  • Media Merging: Created functionalities to merge images and audio into videos, as well as replace audio tracks in existing videos, providing users with versatile multimedia editing options.
  • File Access and Download: Implemented a secure file access system, allowing users to retrieve and download their uploaded files easily.
  • Data Management: Designed and utilized a MySQL database to store user files and metadata, ensuring efficient data handling and retrieval.
